alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 10:43AM MST until December 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch, except 1 to 3 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting up to 30 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern Twin Falls County zone. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will cause reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
